thought: I need to implement the googleSheets read action with the correct parameters to read the commercial flow data from the specified Google Sheets document and sheet name.
plan: Set documentId mode to 'id' and value to the provided document ID.
Set sheetName mode to 'id' and value to the provided sheet name 'commercial'.
Test reading data to verify the output format is as expected for further processing.
criticism: At this stage, only the reading action is implemented. The next steps will implement AI classification and messaging actions.
